Usage: floe rbac diff [OPTIONS]

  Show differences between expected and deployed RBAC (FR-063).

Options:
  -m, --manifest-dir PATH   Directory containing expected RBAC manifests.
  -n, --namespace TEXT      Namespaces to diff (default: from manifests).
  -o, --output [text|json]  Output format.
  --kubeconfig PATH         Path to kubeconfig file.
  -h, --help                Show this message and exit.

  Compares the manifests in the target directory with the actual RBAC
  configuration in the cluster.

  Examples:     $ floe rbac diff     $ floe rbac diff --manifest-dir deploy/rbac
  $ floe rbac diff --output json
